title: Los Angeles Professional Hiring Event. Meet with top employers.
desc: Are you looking for a career in Sales, Banking, Financial Services, ?Management, Retail, Law Enforcement or Government?? Come meet face to face with recruiters and Human Resources Professionals who are hiring for immediate openings.? This Professional Hiring Event is free to job seekers and allows you to connect on a personal level with the employers of your choice.? 1. Click the register button here to secure your spot. 2. If you have a particular position or industry in mind, email your resume to  jobs@talentcareerfairs.com  with the subject "EventBrite" and we will match you to open positions in your area. 3. Be prepared, dress professional and be on time on the day of the event.? We are looking forward to parterning with you on your career search.? For future events please visit our website:  http://talentcareerfairs.com
